name: TapFury
overview:
TapFury focuses on creating entertainment website/apps.

TapFury was started by Fahim Saleh in 2010 after several of his properties he designed on his own took off. Currently, TapFury is concentrating on forging entertainment apps that focus on a a seamless user experience. Some projects in the pipeline include Rocket Dolphin! a game designed for Android phone that stars (appropriately) a dolphin with a jet pack strapped on to him; GoChill, a website/app for NYC that quickly and intelligently finds nightlife events based on the users’ search criteria; and PrankPad, a prank dialing soundboard that transforms the pranking experience into a gaming one.

Gottabemobile.com featured Prankdial as one of its ‘10 Essential Apps on the Android’ and Jimmy Kimmel Live! featured PrankTxt in a segment on his show.
